table.name: Manual deactivation of cat diagnosis inhibition condition
table.description: You can turn off the cat diagnostics by changing this to 1 (lc_inh_cat_diag_man_deac)

table.name: Exhaust configuration
table.description: You can set desired oxygen sensor configuration here

table.name: MIL configuration
table.description: You can set desired MIL lamp configuration here

table.name: Coolant temperature threshold for fast cut-off activation
SAP autolearning
table.description: Parameter to turn off the autolearning of SAP. However if disabled, this forces LV_SAP to 1, meaning it turns ON the SAP. (lc_sap_det_di)

table.name: Basic ignition angle offset VO Min
Basic ignition angle offset VO Max
Exhaust VANOS target - Idle Speed, Cold Engine
Intake VANOS target - Idle Speed, Cold Engine
Exhaust VANOS target - Idle Speed, Warm Engine
Intake VANOS target - Idle Speed, Warm Engine
Exhaust VANOS target - Full Load, Cold Engine
Intake VANOS target - Full Load, Cold Engine
Exhaust VANOS target - Full Load, Warm Engine
Intake VANOS target - Full Load, Warm Engine
Global injection time correction (ALL)
table.description: This multiplier can be used to adjust fueling for different size injectors or different fuel (c_ti_as).

table.name: Global injection time correction
table.description: These multipliers can be used to adjust fueling for different size injectors or different fuel. For example put 1.3 for e85 (c_ti_as_cyl[x]).

table.name: Minimum Injection Time
table.description: This table adjust the minimum injection time, important to change when adding larger injectors (c_ti_min).

table.name: Fuel mass flow to injection time - Bank 1
table.description: Injectionvalve characteristic for fuel mass flow to injection time at standard conditions (c_fac_mff_ti_stnd_1).

table.name: Fuel mass flow to injection time - Bank 2
table.description: Injectionvalve characteristic for fuel mass flow to injection time at standard conditions (c_fac_mff_ti_stnd_2).

table.name: Stoichiometric air to fuel ratio
table.description: Stoichiometric air fuel ratio (c_mff_fac). Orginal conversion is X*0.000001907 to get constant for stoichiometric air/fuel ratio. But in this form, you can put AFR value directly.

table.name: Minimum value for adaptive additive factor for injection
Maximum value for adaptive additive factor for injection
Minimum value for adaptive multiplicative factor for injection at lower area
Maximum value for adaptive multiplicative factor for injection at lower area
Minimum value for adaptive multiplicative factor for injection at higher area
Maximum value for adaptive multiplicative factor for injection at higher area

Minimum engine speed for multiplicative adaptation value calculation at higher area
Maximum engine speed for multiplicative adaptation value calculation at higher area

Maximum airflow for multiplicative adaptation learning at lower area
Minimum airflow for multiplicative adaptation learning at higher area

state.name: 0 - No CAN-EFP available, EFP control via PWM output stage
1 - CAN-EFP signal via local CAN, EFP control via local CAN
2 - CAN-EFP signal via powertrain CAN, EFP control via powertrain CAN

table.name: MAF Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the MAF sensor just in a convenient 16x16 format for easier editing (id_maf_tab).

table.name: SAF MAF Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the MAF sensor just in a convenient 16x16 format for easier editing (id_saf_tab???).

table.name: ECT Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the Engine Coolant Temperature sensor (ip_tco__v_tco).

table.name: IAT Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the Intake Air Temperature sensor. (ip_tia__v_tia)

table.name: Oil Temp Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the Oil Temperature sensor. (ip_toil__v_toil)

table.name: Wideband Lambda Sensor Scaling
table.description: This is the scaling for the Wideband Lambda sensor. (ip_lamb)

table.name: Minimum coolant temperature threshold for full energization of e-thermostat
Coolant temperature
table.data: Minimum coolant temperature threshold for full energization of e-thermostat (c_tco_min_ect)

table.name: Maximum coolant temperature at radiator outlet threshold for e-thermostat activation
Coolant temperature
table.data: Maximum coolant temperature at radiator outlet threshold for e-thermostat activation (c_tco_ex_max_ect)

table.name: Target coolant temperature if coolant temperature at radiator outlet threshold exceeded
Minimum ambient temperature threshold for e-thermostat activation
Ambient temperature
table.data: Minimum ambient temperature threshold for e-thermostat activation (c_tam_min_ect)

table.name: Maximum ambient temperature threshold for e-thermostat activation
Ambient temperature
table.data: Maximum ambient temperature threshold for e-thermostat activation (c_tam_max_ect)

table.name: Target coolant temperature if ambient temperature threshold exceeded

Intake air temperature
table.data: Minimum intake air temperature threshold for e-thermostat activation (c_tia_min_ect)
